content: I absolutely love this for you! No better combo than that. Enjoy!
Woah you've never heard of LOTR? Buckle up, you're in for the ride of a lifetime. So so good.
Oof sorry to hear that. I also didn't love it, but thought I was the only one. Luckily there aren't anymore in the series lol
Right?! Couldn't even make it past page 30... kudos to you for finishing the whole thing.
LOVE this for you! Add a cup of hot coco and you're set.
